title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Transport, Tourism and Sport
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Transport, Tourism and Sport 

(Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 17 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited transport tourism sport (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 17 september 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Iompair, Turasóireachta agus Spóirt and, in the 
English language, the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport, is altered, in 
the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Iompair and, in the English language, to 
that of the Department of Transport.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn iompair turasoireachta agus spoirt english language department transport tourism sport altered irish language roinn iompair english language department transport

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Iompair, Turasóireachta agus 
Spóirt and, in the English language, the Minister for Transport, Tourism and 
Sport, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Iompair and, in the 
English language, to that of the Minister for Transport.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire iompair turasoireachta agus spoirt english language minister transport tourism sport altered irish language taire iompair english language minister transport

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport 
shall be construed as references to the Department of Transport; 

references to the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport shall 
be construed as references to the Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [351] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
